Title: Hot Lead and Cold Feet
Writer: Joseph L. McEveety (screenplay), Arthur Alsberg (screenplay), Don Nelson (screenplay), Rod Piffath (story)
Actors: Jim Dale, Karen Valentine, Don Knotts, Jack Elam
Plot: This saga of the old west involves twin brothers who compete for possession of a rickety cow town founded by their father while a crooked Mayor tries to put an end to the competitors so he can inherit the town himself.
